items.title: Stock Market Crash: Here's 1 High-Dividend Stock That Could Be a Steal Right Now
items.author: Matt Frankel
items.description: Prologis, the largest real estate investment trust in the world, has seen its stock price decline by 17% since the announcement of tariffs. However, the article argues that Prologis is a rock-solid REIT with a bright future, currently trading at a discount, and could be a great value investment opportunity.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article argues that Prologis is a rock-solid REIT with a bright future, despite some short-term concerns related to tariffs. The company has strong fundamentals, including growth in funds from operations, a strong balance sheet, and exposure to the growing e-commerce industry. The article suggests that Prologis is currently trading at a discount and could be a great value investment opportunity.
The article mentions Amazon as Prologis' largest tenant, but does not provide any specific commentary on Amazon's performance or outlook.
The article lists Walmart as one of Prologis' major tenants, but does not provide any further analysis on the company.
The article mentions UPS as one of Prologis' major tenants, but does not provide any additional information about the company.
The article lists Home Depot as one of Prologis' major tenants, but does not offer any commentary on the company.
